description:
Does exactly what I wanted to do but does not play nicely with GNOME. I searched for a specific type of icon and it found what I was looking for perfectly. So I cant fault it as an icon viewer. It loaded quickly and setting the icon size worked as expected.

The highlight around the selected icon didn't cover the icon properly and it only filled half the window when it was maximised. Being QT based it looks quite clunky and I think it might only shows icons for the Qt icon theme but I'm not sure about that.

Se queda la pantalla negra al usarlo
Sería bueno que arreglen eso
Uso Lubuntu 18.04... quizá ese sea el problema (?
